CustomField.description: Req#2652: Data Quality plan date issue for predictive analysis.
CustomField.formula: OR( DQ_Plan_Date__c, AND(ISBLANK(G2_Approval_Date__c), G2_Planned_Date__c >= DATEVALUE($Label.Current_Period_Start_Date), G2_Planned_Date__c <= DATEVALUE($Label.Current_Period_End_Date)), AND(ISBLANK(G3_Approval_Date__c), G3_Planned_Date__c >= DATEVALUE($Label.Current_Period_Start_Date), G3_Planned_Date__c <= DATEVALUE($Label.Current_Period_End_Date)), AND(ISBLANK(G4_Approval_Date__c), G4_Planned_Date__c >= DATEVALUE($Label.Current_Period_Start_Date), G4_Planned_Date__c <= DATEVALUE($Label.Current_Period_End_Date)), AND(ISBLANK(G5_Approval_Date__c), G5_Planned_Date__c >= DATEVALUE($Label.Current_Period_Start_Date), G5_Planned_Date__c <= DATEVALUE($Label.Current_Period_End_Date)), AND(ISBLANK(G6_Approval_Date__c), G6_Planned_Date__c >= DATEVALUE($Label.Current_Period_Start_Date), G6_Planned_Date__c <= DATEVALUE($Label.Current_Period_End_Date)) )
CustomField.label: Data Quality Plan Date PREDICTIVE
